name: SwiftyBot
description: SwiftyBot is an example on how to create a Telegram, Facebook Messenger, and Google Assistant bot with Swift using Vapor.

TELEGRAM_SECRET.description: A secret key that will be used to ensure that only Telegram can call your Telegram bot.

MESSENGER_SECRET.description: A secret key that will be used to ensure that only Facebook can call your Facebook Messenger bot.

MESSENGER_TOKEN.description: A messenger token that will be created for you by Facebook.

ASSISTANT_SECRET.description: A secret key that will be used to ensure that only Google can call your Google Assistant bot.
